products.title: Vitra Blackout Sunburst Yellow Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Vitra Blackout Sunburst Yellow Roller Blind in Yellow. Made to measure from £8.77 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Vitra blackout sunburst yellow fabric is a stunning, bright but subtle shade of yellow, perfect to add a bright pop of colour into your interiors. This shade will work beautifuly as an accent with chic grey shades but will also compliment natural wooden tones. A real all rounder.Blackout fabrics will completely block light from coming through making them a perfect addition for bedrooms and any room that requires maximum light control. The quality of this fabric range is second to none and will provide a high quality finish to your interior style.
 
 Product ID: SDB-RBX2147 Fabric Colour: Sunburst Yellow Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Vitra Blackout Sunburst Yellow 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Vitra Blackout Sunburst Yellow 89mm Vertical Blind in Yellow. Made to measure from £12.11 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This 89mm Vertical Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
This Sunburst Yellow blackout vertical blind adds a invigorating splash of colour to your home, whilst blocking the light.  Value for money and made from high-quality polyester-based fabric, your new yellow blackout vertical blind is perfect for office, bedroom and living rooms.At Swift Direct Blinds, not only is is this bright yellow vertical blind hand made to your measurements, by our expert team, it also comes with a FREE five year guarantee!

products.title: Vitra Blackout Sunburst Yellow Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Vitra Blackout Sunburst Yellow Electric Roller Blind in Yellow. Made to measure from £123.62 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Vitra blackout sunburst yellow fabric is a stunning, bright but subtle shade of yellow, perfect to add a bright pop of colour into your interiors. This shade will work beautifuly as an accent with chic grey shades but will also compliment natural wooden tones. A real all rounder. 
 
Blackout fabrics will completely block light from coming through making them a perfect addition for bedrooms and any room that requires maximum light control. The quality of this fabric range is second to none and will provide a high quality finish to your interior style.  
 
This child-safe, electric roller blind can be upgrade for use with smart phones, Amazon Alexa and Google Home Hub devices.  At Swift Direct Blinds, not only is this Electric Roller Blind made by our expert team, but it also comes with a FREE five year gurarantee!
